DOC.brief_summary: The objective post-market study compare post-procedure recovery two type minimally invasive catheter treatment venous disease Great Saphenous Vein .
DOC.brief_title: ClosureFAST vs. Laser Ablation Treatment GSV Disease : A Multicenter , Single-Blinded , Randomized Study .
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison post-procedure recovery radiofrequency treatment vs. laser treatment .
DOC.criteria: All subject must provide write informed consent . Must candidate either treatment RFA endovenous laser . Subjects require additional treatment either leg within 30 day study procedure . Subjects participate another investigational study .
DOC.keyword: Varicose vein , venous reflux , GSV disease
